result.execSummary:
The defendant Adriana T Gast was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.
All financials same as noted above.

Psycological evaluation and follow through.  
Domestic violence assessment and follow through. 
Provide a DNA sample.
in 1 year if successful completion of probation and paid in full, no new criminal offenses

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: from DA to Atty Haacke re: Discovery pg's 1-26 & driver/criminal record

Defendant Adriana T Gast in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a plea of not guilty.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 19, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Adriana T Gast in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Needs to see the Public Defender today.  Bond continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
no contact with B.B. take all prescribed meds
Take medication as prescribed.  No contact with BB directly or indirectly.

Defendant Adriana T Gast in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Adriana T Gast appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Scott E. Niemi appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Adriana T Gast appeared by video means.  Amend the criminal complaint for location to be City of Shawano.  Defendant waives right to an attorney and enters no contest plea; however, DA cannot make an offer to resolve case today because there is a victim.  After Judge questions the defendant about medications and court procedures, he decides we will not be proceeding today.  Signature bond set.  Not accepting attorney waiver or plea today.  Start over at the next hearing.  Defendant told where the Public Defender Office is located.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
